t: Amazon (company) - Wikipedia
s: 4 days ago - Amazon sells many products under its own brand names, including phone chargers, batteries, and diaper wipes. The AmazonBasics brand was introduced in 2009, and now features hundreds of product lines, including smartphone cases, computer mice, batteries, dumbbells, and dog crates.

t: Watch American Traditions | Prime Video
s: Texas' poet laureate Red Steagall narrates this informative documentary about America's Great Migration west in the early 1800s, when hundreds of ordinary Americans left everything they owned behind to trudge thousands of miles across the Great American Desert toward new lives in the west.

t: Culture and diversity in the Amazon | Colombia Country Brand
s: Leticia is very special. It lies along the edge of the Amazon River, and it shares borders with Brazil, and Peru.
